text: The women's marathon event at the 1986 Commonwealth Games was held in Edinburgh, Scotland on 1 August 1986.ARRS ResultsPower of 10 Results It was the first time that women contested the marathon at the Commonwealth Games. ==Results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style=" text-align:center" |- !Rank !! title: Athletics at the 1986 Commonwealth Games – Women's marathon
